A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some obvious flaws and a lot of justified criticism from the hard core fans\, but I found the movie to be entertaining and worth watching. It's really about expectations.  I learned when episode 1 came out that there will never really be an equal for the experience that we had with the original movies\, but that shouldn't overshadow our willingness to embrace the Star Wars of today. I'm glad that the story continues even if it doesn't always go the way I would like.
